content.contents:
the cover for my fourth single, 'the pleasure is everlasting'.
the title comes from a sonic youth track, 'secret girl', from their album 'evol'. i love sonic youth, they're by all means my favorite band of all time.
another evangelion cover. when i think, 'the pleasure is everlasting', i tend to think of third impact. hence the imagery... i know, a 'breakcore' artist using aesthetics from lain and evangelion, so original. believe it or not, other people use these aesthetics too! isn't that crazy?
i don't like the mixing much on this track. maybe down the line i'll do a redux of it.
